#summary Notes about the location bar

= Introduction =

Currently the location bar is primitive and just based upon the history.  Below are notes to make a better location bar.


Matches:

Full url from the beginning of the string
Strip scheme and complete on host/domain from the start of the string
string search in the url
string search in the title

Sorting:
Primary sorting goes by the most recently visited
Then If a site has been visited more then once top of the week
